source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  Use the [`amp-google-document-embed`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-google-document-embed-v0.1.md) component to embed PDFs and other documents formats directly into your AMP HTML files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-google-document-embed</title>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-google-document-embed/index.html">
  <!-- ## Setup -->
  <!-- Import the `amp-google-document-embed` component in the header -->
  <script async custom-element="amp-google-document-embed" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-google-document-embed-0.1.js"></script>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>
   <!-- ## Basic usage -->
   <!--
     Documents are embedded via the src attribute. Here we're embedding a PDF document.
   -->
  <amp-google-document-embed src="https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/pkg/GPO-CONAN-1992/pdf/GPO-CONAN-1992-6.pdf" width="8.5" height="11" layout="responsive">
  </amp-google-document-embed>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Use the [`amp-google-document-embed`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-google-document-embed-v0.1.md) component to embed PDFs and other documents formats directly into your AMP HTML files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

Use the amp-google-document-embed component to embed PDFs and other documents formats directly into your AMP HTML files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

Use the [`amp-google-document-embed`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-google-document-embed-v0.1.md) component to embed PDFs and other documents formats directly into your AMP HTML files.

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-google-document-embed` component in the header
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import the `amp-google-document-embed` component in the header

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_: Documents are embedded via the src attribute. Here we're embedding a PDF document.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Documents are embedded via the src attribute. Here we're embedding a PDF document.
